name: Nexus Defenders
storyline: In a galaxy once unified and protected by the Spinal Nexus, tranquility fractures under the looming shadow of an enigmatic invader. With the Nexus compromised, you are thrust into the role of the Captain, charged with mounting a defense against the relentless assault by the mysterious Astraea. At your side, Echo, an advanced tactical AI, offers wisdom and strategy to navigate a path fraught with formidable adversaries, including the fearsome Deathbringer and The Ironbourne. Amidst the chaos of war, you are compelled to shed the comforts of your past, adopting a mindset geared towards growth and resilience. The fate of the galaxy hinges on your ability to adapt, lead, and conquer.
summary: Tower Defense meets a Visual Novel narrative. Place an arsenal of towers to halt the invading enemy. Use special abilities such as napalm strikes, EMP blasts, and orbital lasers. A sci-fi space drama, filled with dialogue choices.
